author: Betsy Morris
title: #DeleteFacebook? Get Ready for an Emotional Roller Coaster
text:
Matt Carter is trying to end a relationship he suspects has run its course. But breaking up with Facebook is hard to do.
He discovered that on his drive home from his senior product manager job at Idexx Laboratories Inc. in Westbrook, Maine, last week. As he listened to the latest news about the social-media giant, he thought seriously for the first time: Maybe I will delete Facebook.
